intro: Ecbolium linaria, commonly known as the narrowleaf linaria, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It is characterized by its slender, linear leaves and vibrant yellow to orange flowers that bloom in the summer months. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. It belongs to the family Orobanchaceae, which includes several parasitic and hemiparasitic species. Ecbolium linaria is often found in dry, open habitats such as grasslands and coastal areas.
